lines.text: Pepper, why are those guys stealing the car?
Because they're bad guys and thats what bad guys do. They steal things, and they hurt people. Do I have to explain everything.
No sense you going to look by yourself, I'll help you. Get me out of here.
Pepper, where could she be? Where do you think she went Pepper?
Well, lets just get out of the barn first ok?
Did Justin say anything to you about me?
Oh, I don't know, anything. About me.
Well he did say you were pretty cute... and he really liked you. Is that what you meant?

[pause]
Katie, I could just kill you sometimes, you know that?
